From: Dmitriy Traytel <traytel@di.ku.dk>
Dear all,

some of you may have noticed the recent change of my email address. At my new affiliation, the University of Copenhagen, I am looking to fill two PhD positions and a Postdoc position from early 2021 on the following topics:

[PhD1] Explanations of runtime monitoring verdicts https://employment.ku.dk/phd/?show=152745
[PhD2] Formal verification of data stream processing https://employment.ku.dk/phd/?show=152743
[Postdoc] Formal verification of runtime monitoring https://employment.ku.dk/faculty/?show=152776

The positions are funded by a grant from the Novo Nordisk Foundation. Especially for the latter two topics, experience with Isabelle is a big plus. The above links provide more details and instructions on how to apply. Feel free to contact me, if you are interested or know suitable candidates.

Best wishes,
Dmitriy
